title: Gameplay: Super Galaxy Kindred
body: Whenever a Kindred appears from fog of war with this skin on, the game temporarily freezes. You cannot perform any actions for 1-2 seconds which could be gamechanging, It happened more than once but not 100% of the time.

replies.body:
Hiya LukemDukem - 

Thanks for the report! Is this something you're experiencing as Kindred, on the team team as Kindred or when there is a Kindred on the enemy team? 

If it's on the enemy team, I have a feeling it may be similar to what we experienced with Dark Star Thresh in terms of a FoW issue (although not exactly the same 'cause there was some weird stuff going on script side).
I had this problem to with super galaxy kindred when the enemy appeared on screen game froze for about 3 seconds. It also happened for enemy challenger nidalees but haven't seen any recently.

Thanks for the additional context! Challenger Nidalee was a particle pre-load with the spear coming out of FoW; this was resolved shortly after the skin was launched. Looks like this may be similar in the case of SG Kindred. We're working with the team to find out what's going on here.
my League crashed 2 times while playing with SG Kindred ( i was the kindred) idk if it helps. since i got no video of it etc.
